name: Analyze New Incident
description: Automatically analyze and correlate new incidents when they are created
agent_prompt:
A new incident has been created. Please:
1. Analyze the incident description for correlation with existing incidents
2. Determine the appropriate severity level
3. Check if this incident should trigger problem creation
4. Generate initial response recommendations

Use the ITIL standards from steering to guide your analysis. Focus on autonomous decision-making with clear reasoning.
